stackers.coadd_stacker module¶

class stackers.coadd_stacker.CoaddStacker(RaCol='fieldRA', DecCol='fieldDec', m5Col='fiveSigmaDepth', nightcol='night', filterCol='filter', nightCol='night', numExposuresCol='numExposures', visitTimeCol='visitTime', visitExposureTimeCol='visitExposureTime')¶

Fill(tab)¶

Field values estimation per night

Parameters:

tab input table of field values (list given above)
Returns:

Field values per night : list

all fields but m5, numexposures, visittime, visitexposuretime, filter: median value

m5 : coadded (cf m5_coadd)

numexposures, visittime, visitexposuretime: added per night

band: unique band value
colsAdded = ['coadd']¶
m5_coadd(m5)¶

Method to coadd m5 values

\[ \begin{align}\begin{aligned}\phi_{5\sigma} = 10^{-0.4*m_{5}}\\\sigma = \phi_{5\sigma}/5.\\\sigma_{tot} = 1./\sqrt(\sum(1./\sigma^2))\\\phi_{tot} = 5.*\sigma_{tot}\\m_{5}^{coadd} = -2.5*np.log10(\phi_{tot})\end{aligned}\end{align} \]
Parameters:m5 : 5 sigma-depth values
Returns:coadded m5 value
